## LexicalModelCompiler.loadFromFilename() method

Loads a lexical model's source module from the given filename.

**Signature:**

```typescript
loadFromFilename(filename: string): LexicalModelSource;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filename | string | path to the model source file. |

**Returns:**

LexicalModelSource
